page.title: 02An Ordinary School Day
page.content: Mum woke me up at 7.30am,after trying to wake me for 5 minutes she went down stairs to lay the table.I lay there for 10 minutes thinking and dozing.I had breakfast at 7.50am I had rice crispies and a glass of orange juice and a cup of coffee.Then I cleaned my teeth, brushed my hair,ran into my bedroom to pick up my recorder and bag.Then I went up to my Grandma's house to wait for Chirs. we walked along the road meeting Claire and Nikki on the way. We walked to school chatting about different things.Whistle went at 9.00 I walked slowly into class.We did Maths until assembly then we had play time then we did English until lunch,after lunch we carried on with English until 2.30pm then we did Music. At 3.00pm I walked home with Rhian.I went to Guides at 7.00pm.When I got home I had a beefburger and went to bed
